attributes.additional_details:
Sir Cyril Irvine Patnick
Sir Bernard Ingham
Sir Norman Bettison
Following the publication of the Independent report into the Hillsborough disaster the three men named above have all been officially named as liars in the report.
Due to their disgraceful behaviour in spreading malicious and evil lies about Liverpool supporters, victims and survivors of the disaster they should all be stripped of the their Knighthoods with immediate effect.
